channel.title: How do i make someone a member?
channel.description: I forgot how to make someone a member since i quit moparscape for a while.you guys may know me from my v1 server wid 400+ dls. I jsut want to know how to make someone a member and an admin. I see player rights and i put to 2 and i see player ismember and i put 1 but it still does not make them members.Any suggs?

item.title: How do i make someone a member?
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

go to ur data file then click members

then add the players name to the list.

then for the character files make the ismember = 1

to make someone a admin u change the playerrights =2

Read full topic
